https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/whedbvYntJ6iy57Mf7LiB7vKtjQ.jpg Simon transports illegal immigrants to New York, leaving them to their fate. He is discovered by the coastguard and Andrés, a young sailor, saves his life. When he falls for a young protegée of Simon conflict erupts. A Rose from France
